trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>My usual, please. But with this spice.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000020_MEHRYDE<tab>Of course, Zero. It would be my pleasure.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000030_MEHRYDE<tab>Well now, this is enough to make a whole kettle of your special curry!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I don't need that much...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000050_MEHRYDE<tab>Rest assured, it's easy enough to make a serving just for you. Or we could make the kettle and share it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000060_MEHRYDE<tab>There would be enough not only for your companions, but other diners as well. I daresay everyone will be delighted.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Very well. A full kettle, then.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000080_MEHRYDE<tab>Excellent. We'll prepare it at once.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000090_MEHRYDE<tab>And for Your Excellency and our esteemed adventurer? Are you happy to try a bowl of Zero's curry? We can make yours milder, if you prefer...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000100_VARSHAHN<tab>Grateful though I am for the offer, I cannot fully appreciate the flavor with this vessel. Another time, perhaps.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000110_VARSHAHN<tab>Do not hold back on my account, my friend. Eat and enjoy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Then I'll have His Excellency's helping!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>If I could have mine a touch milder...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000120_MEHRYDE<tab>Understood. Please, make yourselves comfortable.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000130_VARSHAHN<tab>It gladdens me to see you taking to life in Radz-at-Han, Zero. In the area of our cuisine not least of all.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000140_VARSHAHN<tab>Spicy dishes have long been favored in our sultry clime for their ability to whet the appetite and cool the body.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000150_VARSHAHN<tab>Of course, spices also have the effect of preserving foods, which makes them highly coveted in foreign lands.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000160_VARSHAHN<tab>All of this has given rise to a thriving spice industry, and the wealth it brings has allowed our nation to prosper while maintaining its neutrality.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So you trade your spices. Seems rather more complicated than trading in aether.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000180_VARSHAHN<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000190_VARSHAHN<tab>In the beginning, this land was no more than refuge for me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000200_VARSHAHN<tab>But now it is my home, and the people of Radz-at-Han my beloved children.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000210_VARSHAHN<tab>Together we built this vibrant nation. And naught would please me more than to show it to my sister one day.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000220_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Vibrant... Rubicante said the same when he described this world.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000230_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A reminder of all that has been stolen from us... What many who remember doubtless yearn to take back.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000240_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Our home is a lost cause, our only choice to begin anew.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000250_FIREMONOLITH<tab>In this world, where we may reclaim our mortality.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000260_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Nonetheless, it's wrong to damn another to save yourself─as I told Rubicante. As I found myself moved to speak...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000270_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I still do not understand what made me feel this way. Nor what compels you mortals to help one another. But I hope to someday.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000280_VARSHAHN<tab>We, too, hope that you will find the answers you seek.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000290_HANNISHMAN04735A<tab>What is going on?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000300_HANNISHMAN04735B<tab>What? What's happening?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000310_MEHRYDE<tab>Compliments of Mistress Zero, the satrap's honored guest, we are serving a special curry for anyone who wishes to partake. But be warned: it is not for the faint of heart!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000320_HANNISHMAN04735B<tab>Oh! By all means, I'd welcome the challenge!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000330_HANNISHMAN04735A<tab>Sisters have mercy...the smell alone is...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000340_HANNISHMAN04735B<tab>It burns! It burns!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000350_VARSHAHN<tab>To better maintain the facade, the alchemists ensured that my vessel was capable of consuming food...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000360_VARSHAHN<tab>However, I fear Zero's curry would test the limits of their design.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000370_MEHRYDE<tab>Apologies for the delay. Please relax and enjoy your meal.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000380_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>“Relax”? I don't have time for that. I've been waiting for this...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Come, let's replenish our aether.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>My whole life flashed before my eyes─and it was exhilarating!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I thought the spices we picked were perfect.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000400_VARSHAHN<tab>I trust you have eaten your fill.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000410_VARSHAHN<tab>I shall have Mehryde prepare a meal for us to take to Estinien. I suspect he too is overdue a “replenishment.”
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000420_VARSHAHN<tab>By this hour, he will have retired to his chambers at Meghaduta. Come, let us pay him a visit.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000430_VARSHAHN<tab>Estinien, are you there? We've brought something for you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000440_ESTINIEN<tab>Aye... Enter...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000450_ESTINIEN<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000460_ESTINIEN<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000470_ESTINIEN<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000480_ESTINIEN<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000490_VARSHAHN<tab>Squid masala from the meyhane. I thought you might enjoy it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000500_ESTINIEN<tab>Masala, eh? I prefer my squid dried, but I'm sure it won't disappoint. My thanks.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000510_ESTINIEN<tab>Idle as I am in our sorceress's absence, I see. I can't offer much in the way of entertainment, but make yourselves comfortable.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Shall we disrobe as well?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000530_VARSHAHN<tab>No, no. We simply caught our friend unprepared. He will make himself presentable at once, I am sure.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000540_YSHTOLA<tab>At last. We've been looking for you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000550_VARSHAHN<tab>My friends! Tell me─were you able to devise a way to return to the Thirteenth?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000560_YSHTOLA<tab>I believe so. It required a visit to the moon, where I took the opportunity to enlist Urianger's assistance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000570_URIANGER<tab>Y'shtola hath told me all. I should be glad to help you free Azdaja and put an end to Golbez's dark plot.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000580_YSHTOLA<tab>If Rubicante spoke true, both Golbez and Azdaja are on the moon of the Thirteenth.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000590_YSHTOLA<tab>Unlike here in the Source, however, we have no means of making the journey from the surface of the star itself. The technology simply does not exist.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000600_YSHTOLA<tab>Therefore, I propose that we employ a gate to deliver us directly to our destination.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000610_VARSHAHN<tab>Is such a feat possible?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000620_YSHTOLA<tab>In theory. Having once been a single whole, the Source and its reflections share striking similarities in geography.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000630_YSHTOLA<tab>And according to a certain someone who unceremoniously whisked us away to the First, the same locations across the worlds are intrinsically bound.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000640_YSHTOLA<tab>All of which is to say, were we to pass through a gate on the Source's moon, it should lead us to the moon of the Thirteenth.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000650_YSHTOLA<tab>Of course, there is the risk of voidsent gaining entry to our world. Thus did I decide to seek Urianger's counsel.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000660_URIANGER<tab>Both the watcher and the Loporrits are aware of our proposed endeavor. While they are yet deliberating precautionary measures, they have pledged their full cooperation.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000670_ESTINIEN<tab>You've been busy. I presume you've also found a way to open this gate?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000680_YSHTOLA<tab>Be it in Radz-at-Han or Sharlayan, scholars have long cast their gaze unto the endless dark of the void.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000690_YSHTOLA<tab>And so, with Hannish insights to augment our knowledge, we have indeed conceived of a promising plan to pierce the veil.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000700_YSHTOLA<tab>A plan I am confident will succeed precisely because the moon is our stage.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000710_YSHTOLA<tab>The preparations will be extensive, and we will require vast quantities of aether.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000720_YSHTOLA<tab>After all, our gate must be large enough to accommodate another great wyrm.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000730_YSHTOLA<tab>My proposal entails delivering copious amounts of aether to the Tower of Babil in Garlemald.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000740_YSHTOLA<tab>As you will recall, Fandaniel used the structure to destroy the brands imprisoning Zodiark.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000750_YSHTOLA<tab>And we, in like manner, will use it to channel aether to the moon─and thereby open our gate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000760_VARSHAHN<tab>I see... Then we shall need someone on the moon for the necessary rituals.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000770_YSHTOLA<tab>Just so, Your Excellency. I intend to head back anon for that very purpose, as well as to help devise our strategy to deal with invading voidsent.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000780_YSHTOLA<tab>Along with our lunar allies, we will once again require the assistance of your alchemists, Nidhana not least of all.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000790_YSHTOLA<tab>May I trouble you to serve as their escort?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000800_ESTINIEN<tab>Fine by me. The room was beginning to feel constraining.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000810_URIANGER<tab>For my part, I shall oversee the requisite tasks on the star. Might I prevail upon you for your assistance?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>If all are in agreement, then let us set to work.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000830_YSHTOLA<tab>We'll open our gate. And we will stop Golbez.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000840_KRILE<tab>Well, now, if it isn't two of my dearest friends. As for the other two... I don't believe we've had the pleasure.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000850_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Not in this vessel, perhaps. 'Tis I, Varshahn...though you are welcome to call me Vrtra, if you prefer.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Pay me no mind. I merely accompany them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000870_URIANGER<tab>I pray you forgive us our intrusion. If you are occupied, we shall call again anon.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000880_KRILE<tab>It's quite all right. We've just finished swapping all our secrets anyway.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000890_KRILE<tab>Erenville occasionally comes and shares the latest gleaner gossip, you see.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000900_KRILE<tab>From forgotten ruins to mysterious relics, if there's aught that might be of interest to the Students, he kindly lets us know.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000910_ERENVILLE<tab>Alas, I must soon depart on an expedition.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000920_ERENVILLE<tab>As I may be away for an extended period, I wished to give Krile fair warning. Hence my visit today.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000930_URIANGER<tab>I see. There are specimens that want for procuring, I presume?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000940_ERENVILLE<tab>No, no, it isn't guildship business, but rather...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000950_ERENVILLE<tab>A homecoming.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000960_ERENVILLE<tab>But enough about me. You have business too, yes? And I am in the way.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000970_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Far from it. As a matter of fact, we should be grateful if you could stay and share your knowledge of the nearby isles with us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000980_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>We seek a means to travel to the void. There, a man named Golbez plots to invade our world. A man who even now holds my sister hostage...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000990_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>...To that end, we require a great quantity of aether, which we understand may be had on the Isle of Haam. We came in the hope of exploring how it might best be procured.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001000_KRILE<tab>An invasion from the Thirteenth? Must the stakes always be so dramatic...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001010_ERENVILLE<tab>You have a knack for finding trouble.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001020_ERENVILLE<tab>If gleaners collected world-ending crises, you could make quite a name for yourself in our profession.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001030_ERENVILLE<tab>It's true the Isle of Haam is a veritable font of aether. But as it's under the Forum's direct jurisdiction, only a privileged few get to set foot there. I myself haven't.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001040_KRILE<tab>So if we want to help ourselves to the isle's aether, we'll need to secure the Forum's permission.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001050_KRILE<tab>Very well. The Students of Baldesion recognize your endeavors as combating a grave threat to the world. As representative, I hereby pledge our full assistance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001060_KRILE<tab>Now that it's official, you may leave the politics and paperwork to me. Our operations remain small, but we shouldn't meet any undue resistance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001070_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>We are truly grateful!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001080_URIANGER<tab>If I may.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001090_URIANGER<tab>According to the original plan for the exodus, aether collected from the Isle of Haam was to power the ark.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001100_URIANGER<tab>Art thou perchance familiar with the logistics of this endeavor?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001110_ERENVILLE<tab>I don't know anything about that, I'm afraid, nor do I think any gleaner would. You might have better luck asking someone involved with the ark's construction.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001120_ERENVILLE<tab>Margrat, for instance. She's a researcher in Sharlayan Hamlet. I met with her for a job recently, and she mentioned working on the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>'s propulsion system.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001130_ERENVILLE<tab>You could do worse than to seek her out while awaiting the Forum's verdict.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001140_URIANGER<tab>We may well do just that. Our gratitude for thine advice, and may this threat be but a memory upon thy return.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001150_ERENVILLE<tab>You're quite welcome. Now then, if you'll excuse me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001160_KRILE<tab>I'd best start drafting our petition! Go on and find your researcher─I'll contact you as soon as we've made progress.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001170_URIANGER<tab>Let us leave matters here to Mistress Krile, and hie ourselves to Labyrinthos.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001180_KRILE<tab>Right, then. Time to put our best foot forward.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001190_KRILE<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001200_KRILE<tab>A pity you can't tidy yourself. I should've had Y'shtola enchant you when I had the chance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001210_KRILE<tab>And what have we here?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001220_KRILE<tab>Later, Krile. Later. You've work to do!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001230_HAAMBORTMAN<tab>Bound for the Isle of Haam? You look like the ones Master Fourchenault told me to expect.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001240_HAAMBORTMAN<tab>If you're ready to depart, then so am I. Just say the word.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001250_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Is something the matter?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001260_URIANGER<tab>I did recruit one other to our party, but he is late to arrive...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001270_THANCRED<tab>Forgive me my delay.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001280_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Thancred! 'Tis good to see you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001290_THANCRED<tab>If it isn't Varshahn. They do grow up so quickly.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001300_THANCRED<tab>Urianger tells me we have a host of exciting new tribulations to face.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001310_THANCRED<tab>And you must be Zero. I've heard all about your derring-do in Garlemald. A pleasure.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001320_URIANGER<tab>Apart from strengthening our company with his redoubtable skill at arms, Thancred may also serve as a mentor in those matters that trouble thee.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001330_URIANGER<tab>I speak of the intangible forces which bring souls together. Thancred is possessed of experience both unique and insightful that I am sure he would gladly share with thee. Thou needst but ask.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001340_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Much obliged for clearin' the way! We'll get to work at once!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001350_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Fillin' these up will take a good while. I'd appreciate it if you stood watch till we've finished.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001360_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>I ain't gettin' chewed to chum by some aether-bloated bugger!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001370_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Oh, by the by.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001380_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Where were you plannin' on puttin' these to use? We could deliver 'em by airship, see─provided it ain't too far.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001390_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>We would need them transported to Garlemald─to the Tower of Babil.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001400_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Ahh, that's a long old journey... Too long for a direct flight. Tell you what: we'll send 'em over with the scheduled shipment of provisions headed that way.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001410_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>I'll make the arrangements as soon as we get back. Save some poor chocobos havin' to drag this lot through the snow.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001420_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>You have our thanks. We shall not forget your generosity.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001430_THANCRED<tab>Everything seems to be proceeding apace. I daresay you would've been fine without me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001440_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Why would you say such a thing?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001450_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You are not bound by contract or the threat of force, and you gain no advantage by devaluing your own contribution.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001460_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Yet you must be bound by something to speak thus. What is it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001470_THANCRED<tab>What binds me... Hmm.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001480_THANCRED<tab>A belief, I suppose. Born of our shared struggles.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001490_THANCRED<tab>No matter where my comrades go, I have faith they will be fine. For I know that they will walk their chosen path as surely as I walk mine.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001500_THANCRED<tab>I trust them, in short─trite though it may sound.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Trust...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I remember the word. How long has it been since last I used it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001530_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It had no place in my dealings. Not with other voidsent, and certainly not with Zenos. Not even in the time before Darkness engulfed the world...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Full often did memoriates betray their own, corrupted by the very power they wielded. You could trust no one but yourself.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001550_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Alone we fought, and alone we fell.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001560_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I wouldn't know how to trust.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001570_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Is there some trick to it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001580_THANCRED<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001590_THANCRED<tab>Just stay close to this one. You'll learn in no time.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001600_THANCRED<tab>Aye, absolutely fine.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001610_URIANGER<tab>I confess, I thought thou mightst have more words of counsel to offer.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001620_THANCRED<tab>Oh, she'll soon get the hang of it─even without my help. After our work here is done, I'll see myself back to the shadows.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001630_THANCRED<tab>But before that... I take it you've heard as well?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001640_URIANGER<tab>Indeed. The client seeketh Archons, and 'twould seem our extensive travels and neutrality make us prime candidates.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001650_THANCRED<tab>Well, assuming we take on the request, I suspect I'll be stuck with you again. Don't let me down, hm?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001660_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Praise the Sisters you are safe!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001670_METTIUS<tab>Don't think I'm indebted to you. I never asked for your help.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001680_JULLUS<tab>You love Garlemald dearly, Lord Mettius. That much is plain. But you're not alone in that.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001690_JULLUS<tab>We all mourn what has become of our homeland. Bristle at having to rely upon outsiders simply to survive the cold.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001700_JULLUS<tab>Even now, I struggle with fear and uncertainty. Day after day, I ask myself, what is right? Where do we go from here?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001710_JULLUS<tab>I've yet to find the answers.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001720_JULLUS<tab>But I won't stop looking nonetheless. And I won't avert my gaze from our grim reality.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001730_METTIUS<tab>Is there hope for us?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001740_JULLUS<tab>Aye. So long as we live.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001750_JULLUS<tab>Garlemald lies in ruins, but the bonds between us will never be broken.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001760_JULLUS<tab>We are the chain that connects generations past and future. You and I its links. Help us, Lord Mettius, for all we have been and for what we may yet become. Please.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001770_METTIUS<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001780_METTIUS<tab>To be lectured by the young... It ill becomes a man of my station.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001790_METTIUS<tab>I will rejoin the talks at Tertium. Might I trouble you to escort me?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001800_METTIUS<tab>Ere we part... I apologize for my...discourtesy. I owe you my life, and...I thank you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Jullus, wait. I'd like a word.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001820_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>With you as well. I'm to stay close, after all.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001830_URIANGER<tab>Worry not, we shall see the magistrate safely back to Tertium.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001840_JULLUS<tab>What is it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001850_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You bound that man with trust, didn't you? That's why he did not require coercion to return.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001860_JULLUS<tab>Er... Shall we walk, perhaps? Chilly standing around here.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001870_JULLUS<tab>So that's how Zero came to join you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001880_JULLUS<tab>Still, I'm not sure I'm qualified to explain something like trust.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001890_JULLUS<tab>I wouldn't describe myself as a sociable person. Before all...this...any free time I had, I spent looking after my brother and sister.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001900_JULLUS<tab>As for the magistrate, I only told him what's been on my mind of late...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001910_JULLUS<tab>But I wouldn't have done so, I think, if it weren't for the twins' influence.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001920_JULLUS<tab>Trust is infectious, in a manner of speaking. When someone believes in you, it makes you want to believe in them. In others. In yourself.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001930_JULLUS<tab>Perhaps it's because the magistrate felt that earnestness that he gave us a chance. As I did, after I was caught trying to steal provisions from “the enemy.” Trust comes easy in such company.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001940_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Little wonder my world is devoid of it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001950_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>No one trusts in you, and so you trust in no one. And round the wheel turns.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001960_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>During the Contramemoria, we had already come to judge one another based on strength and usefulness.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001970_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You either used or were used. Those who rejected this rule didn't survive.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001980_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>My mother wanted to save the world. To fulfill the hopes of memoriates good and true. After she died, I carried on her mission alone.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001990_JULLUS<tab>Alone... Didn't you have anyone to help you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002000_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Almost. Two men tried, just the once.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A swordsman and a mage, whom I met when passing through a village. They had saved the people there from corrupted memoriates.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>When they learned our enemies were the same, they seemed heartened.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>They claimed to be soldiers of a kingdom called Baron, and were traveling the realm in search of a means to end the Contramemoria.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>They invited me to join them. I refused. How could I not, having learned the lessons of my world?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Those who would work with others always have their own motives. I would not place myself at their mercy. I would not be forced to submit.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I expected some manner of outburst. Some show of frustration at having failed to deceive me. But they simply watched me walk away.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I didn't know what to make of it then, but now... Perhaps they shared a bond of trust. Perhaps they were the last ones left who dared.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Perhaps they hoped I was like them, too. Perhaps it was just an offer and nothing more.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002090_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I continued fighting alone. But ultimately, I was undone. Overwhelmed by enemies that had banded together.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I was cold. In pain. Wishing desperately that someone would save me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And as I lay there in solitude, I felt it happen. The breaking of our world.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Darkness washed over me, and I was swept into the rift.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002130_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>When I finally managed to return, it was to a world forever transformed. My home, now filled with abominations.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I had a chance to learn about trust...and forsook it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002150_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I never had the power to save my home single-handed. I should have accepted their invitation.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002160_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Had I joined them, as I've joined you, I might not have had to face the end of the world alone.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But it's all history, now. No amount of reflection or regret will change our present reality.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002180_JULLUS<tab>Whatever may have happened in the past, you're still here, Zero. Alive.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002190_JULLUS<tab>So long as you're alive, there will always be hope. No matter how bad things get.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002200_JULLUS<tab>What you couldn't do yesterday, you might still do today.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002210_JULLUS<tab>Think about it. It's plain that you've forged bonds with those around you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002220_JULLUS<tab>If you didn't feel that in some sense, would you have risked your life as you did for a meager ration of buuz?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002230_JULLUS<tab>I trust you too, for what it's worth.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002240_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Here it is again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002250_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The fire that burned in my breast when you came to my rescue. The urge to weep, though there is no sorrow...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002260_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If this is trust, then what must I do? How do I answer it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>However you like.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>With a handshake, perhaps?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002270_JULLUS<tab>Give me your hand.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002280_JULLUS<tab>It's not something you do constantly, mind. A friend is a friend regardless.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002290_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A “friend”? ...So that's what it means.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002300_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Someone you trust.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002310_URIANGER<tab>Let us take a moment to review matters as they stand.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002320_URIANGER<tab>Having procured sufficient stores of aether, we may now channel the requisite energy unto the moon via the Tower of Babil. Our work on the star is complete.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002330_URIANGER<tab>However, we have yet to receive word from Y'shtola as to the state of the lunar preparations.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002340_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>A ritual to open the gate, and measures to forestall a voidsent invasion...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002350_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Neither task is simple nor quickly completed. She would doubtless benefit from our assistance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002360_URIANGER<tab>The very thing I was about to propose. Let us join her above and lend what aid we may.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002370_URIANGER<tab>Ere we set forth, however, Y'shtola did bid me relay a message to thee.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002380_URIANGER<tab>As thou art well aware, a key objective of our mission is the extraction of thy sister Azdaja from the void.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002390_URIANGER<tab>Held captive for millennia and divested of an eye, she is like to be severely weakened. To make good her escape, she shall require aid─aid that is best provided by a fellow great wyrm.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002400_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>You would have me go in my true form?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002410_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Very well. Like our sire, we great wyrms are capable of traversing the great expanse. The journey will take some time, but I shall take myself to the moon.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002420_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>To begin with, I shall return this vessel to Radz-at-Han, that I may have both my eyes.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002430_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>And until such time as we find Azdaja, I would entrust her eye to your keeping.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002440_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Will you do this for me?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002450_URIANGER<tab>We shall contact you via linkpearl once all is in place on the moon. You need but follow Y'shtola's instructions.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002460_ALISAIE<tab>Understood. We'll be ready.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002470_JULLUS<tab>Take care, Zero.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002480_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It will be the briefest of homecomings. I'll be back before you know it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002490_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>In Mare Lamentorum, then. Go well!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002500_URIANGER<tab>I took the liberty of informing Y'shtola of our arrival. She and her entourage should be here momentarily.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002510_YSHTOLA<tab>Forgive me, I'd hoped to have everything in order sooner. My thanks for the extra hands.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002515_URIANGER<tab>[AMUSED CHUCKLE]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002520_URIANGER<tab>Alphinaud and Alisaie stand ready at the Tower of Babil. Vrtra is also en route.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002530_YSHTOLA<tab>Excellent. You've done well, all of you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002540_YSHTOLA<tab>For my part, I've managed to prepare the ritual with help from the watcher.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002550_YSHTOLA<tab>All that remains is to channel the aether from below. This should─I pray─open a gate leading to the moon of the Thirteenth.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002560_NIDHANA<tab>May I just say how excited we are to be a part of this grand undertaking! The development of the artificial Atomos was one thing, but this is an opportunity like no other!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002570_NIDHANA<tab>Y'shtola even managed to get a loan of Allagan treatises on voidsent summoning from the prized collection of the Sons of Saint Coinach!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002580_NIDHANA<tab>The empire's application of aetherochemistry in regulating voidgates provided us with many a useful insight for our work, let me tell you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002590_YSHTOLA<tab>I asked a favor of G'raha Tia when we were comparing notes on cross-rift travel.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002600_YSHTOLA<tab>Given his credentials, I was confident he wouldn't be denied.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002610_YSHTOLA<tab>The knowledge of our forebears has brought us far. As has our own.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002620_YSHTOLA<tab>And with our knowledge and resources, we shall construct a voidsent containment seal on a heretofore unseen scale.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002630_URIANGER<tab>Containment seal... Then thou wouldst make use of...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002640_YSHTOLA<tab>Aye. A tried and tested means of holding dark entities at bay is readily available here. 'Twould be remiss of us not to employ it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002650_YSHTOLA<tab>We shall reforge the brands that Zenos and Fandaniel destroyed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002660_YSHTOLA<tab>That which held even Zodiark shall more than suffice for voidsent of any persuasion.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002670_NIDHANA<tab>The watcher is already hard at work tending to the most critical parts of the brands' restoration.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002680_NIDHANA<tab>There are, however, a number of concerning factors that remain. With your help, I'm sure we can resolve them!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002690_YSHTOLA<tab>Time is of the essence, so I suggest we continue this discussion as we make our way to the brands.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002700_LIVINGWAY<tab>Dreadfully sorry to have kept you all waiting!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002710_MAPPINGWAY<tab>Hello there, friends. And new person. Heard there was a bit of a rush, so we gathered what combat-ready supporters we had available.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002720_URIANGER<tab>A welcome contribution. Thine initiative never ceaseth to amaze.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002730_LIVINGWAY<tab>Oh, stop! You're making me blush!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002740_LIVINGWAY<tab>Even now as we pursue new dreams, aiding the people of Etheirys remains our greatest joy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002750_LIVINGWAY<tab>Though we have fulfilled the purpose given to us by Hydaelyn, aiding the people of Etheirys remains our greatest joy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002760_LIVINGWAY<tab>So you can count on us, ever and always!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002770_LIVINGWAY<tab>Right, so! We originally deployed these supporters to patrol the moon and keep it safe.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002780_LIVINGWAY<tab>They've never tussled with voidsent before, but with sufficient data, they ought to hold their own against the ghastly fiends.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002790_LIVINGWAY<tab>Practical, tactical data, acquired in the moment. And who better to give the supporters an educational thrashing than the champion of Etheirys?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I believe I would make a better instructor.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Not only have I fought voidsent─I am one.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002820_SLEEPINGWAY<tab>Well don't just stand there, engage!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002830_SLEEPINGWAY<tab>Engage, engage, engage!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002840_LIVINGWAY<tab>That'll do! That'll do!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002850_LIVINGWAY<tab>A defeat bitterer than the bitterest carrot... Using this experience, we must enhance the supporters and turn them into voidsent slaughter-bots!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002860_MAPPINGWAY<tab>Indeed... Right after we've managed to put the poor dears back together.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002870_URIANGER<tab>Pray forgive our comrade's enthusiasm. May I inquire as to how long the repairs will take?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002880_MAPPINGWAY<tab>On an ordinary day, I'd say no less than five carrots, briskly consumed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002890_MAPPINGWAY<tab>But if you were to provide us with encouragement...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002900_MAPPINGWAY<tab>We just might be able to do it in two.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002910_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>This, I leave to you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>Can you hear me? We've just finished restoring the brands.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002930_YSHTOLA<tab>Let us reconvene once you've finished tending to matters there. The culmination of our efforts is nigh!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002950_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Apologies for the wait. The preparations here are finally complete.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Excellent. The tower too is activated. But give the word, and we will begin channeling the aether.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002970_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Very well, then. Make it so.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002980_ALISAIE<tab>The moment of truth!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002990_NIDHANA<tab>By the Sisters...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003000_YSHTOLA<tab>Urianger, commence your invocations. 'Tis time to open our gate!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003010_YSHTOLA<tab>A tear is beginning to form! Quickly, activate the brands!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003020_YSHTOLA<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003030_YSHTOLA<tab>Success... The gate is open, and the seal appears to be in place...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Let's see how well it holds.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003050_VOIDSENT04735<tab>What an enormous gate! Lord Golbez will be eager to hear of this!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003060_VOIDSENT04735<tab>So this is the promised land... The land of boundless aether!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003070_VOIDSENT04735<tab>Arrrgh!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003080_URIANGER<tab>I daresay the seal doth serve its purpose.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003090_VRITRA<tab>I see all proceedeth apace. Remarkable...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003100_YSHTOLA<tab>Indeed. Just this moment, a voidsent emerged from the gate─by which we may safely assume it leads to the Thirteenth.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003110_NIDHANA<tab>It's incredible, Y'shtola! Truly incredible! Oh, what an honor it is to have been part of this historic achievement!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003120_YSHTOLA<tab>A part is an understatement. None of this would have been possible without you and yours.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003130_YSHTOLA<tab>Our success has also served to solidify our understanding of cross-rift travel.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003140_YSHTOLA<tab>The Ascians rejoined reflections to the Source by instigating elemental imbalances. These imbalances weakened the barrier between realities, causing the aether of a reflection to flood the Source.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003150_YSHTOLA<tab>But why is it that reflections are predisposed to rejoin the Source? Why have they never merged with one another?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003160_URIANGER<tab>Thou art suggesting there is a unique property inherent to the Source─one responsible for such an outcome?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003170_YSHTOLA<tab>I am. 'Tis my conclusion that, as the point of origin for the reflections, the Source has an innate “pull” over them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003180_YSHTOLA<tab>Hydaelyn, I believe, sought to suppress that pull, which is why She was created with the power of Light─of stasis.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003190_YSHTOLA<tab>Meanwhile, the power of Darkness─of activity─reigns in the void. Hydaelyn's influence would naturally be weaker, and this manifested in the form of planar fissures.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003200_YSHTOLA<tab>Working with this hypothesis, I set my sights upon where the pull was assessed to be strongest. And through our combined efforts, we succeeded in opening a gate to the void.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003210_YSHTOLA<tab>Now, I must stress: it was because we sought the void that we succeeded. Pleased though I am to have my theory proven, the secrets of travel to other reflections still elude us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003220_YSHTOLA<tab>Even so, in the reality that lies beyond the Eighth Umbral Calamity, there are those who found a way to reach the First. I will not rest until I do the same.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003230_ESTINIEN<tab>One step closer to fulfilling your dream, eh?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003240_YSHTOLA<tab>Just a step. Many more remain to be taken.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003250_YSHTOLA<tab>Which further motivates me to forestall a voidsent invasion. So come, let us set forth─to find Azdaja, and put an end to Golbez's plot!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003260_VRITRA<tab>Climb upon my back. I shall take us to the gate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003270_URIANGER<tab>As we did discuss prior, I shall see the alchemists safely home, then together with the Loporrits, maintain vigil over the gate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003280_NIDHANA<tab>May the Sisters watch over and keep you safe!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003290_VRITRA<tab>Unto the void once more!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003300_YSHTOLA<tab>This is the moon of the Thirteenth?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It is. Ever since the Flood, it has been a sanguinary orb in the sky.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003320_ESTINIEN<tab>No voidsent. A rather more subdued reception than I had anticipated.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But unsurprising, given how jealously Golbez conceals the location of his domain.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Still, we must remain on guard. One of his minions came through the gate, after all, and more may lie in wait.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003350_VRITRA<tab>I do not sense my sister... Where could she be? Where?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003360_ESTINIEN<tab>Steady, Vrtra. We've barely arrived. Let us explore our surrounds before drawing conclusions.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003370_VRITRA<tab>Yes... Thou art right.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003380_VRITRA<tab>I shall survey the moon from above. The ground, I leave to you all.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The chasm has caught your attention as well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003400_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>There's some manner of structure below. Worth a look, wouldn't you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>I too sense something here.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003420_YSHTOLA<tab>This pit much resembles the Cradle of Darkness on our moon, where Zodiark was once imprisoned.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003430_YSHTOLA<tab>If this place serves the same function, then a fragment of His power must have been sealed in the depths.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003440_YSHTOLA<tab>Strange, though. When Zodiark perished in the Source, I presumed that every aspect of Him was thus unmade, and His power scattered.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>But it's unmistakable, the Darkness that permeates this abyss. Could a trace of Him yet remain...or is it something else?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003460_VRITRA<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003470_VRITRA<tab>I hear thee, Sister! I hear thee!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003480_VRITRA<tab>Climb on, my friends! Azdaja is here, within this chasm!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003490_VRITRA<tab>Sister!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003500_VRITRA<tab>'Tis I, Vrtra! I have come to rescue thee!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You were entrusted with Azdaja's eye, were you not?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003520_AZDAJA<tab>What? How...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003530_AZDAJA<tab>Vrtra...? Wherefore art thou here...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003540_VRITRA<tab>Oh, thank goodness!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003550_VRITRA<tab>'Tis thee, dear sister. Truly thee... How long have I dreamed of this moment!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003560_VRITRA<tab>Would that I could have found thee sooner...but I am here now. Let us return home, together.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003570_AZDAJA<tab>The thought filleth me with joy...but I fear it cannot be. Not even with a dragon's might can these chains be broken.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003580_AZDAJA<tab>For they are forged of the very will of the man named Golbez.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003590_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So this is indeed Golbez's domain.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003600_AZDAJA<tab>Thou keepest company with mortals?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003610_VRITRA<tab>I do. They are my stalwart allies, without whom I could not have come this far.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003620_AZDAJA<tab>Is that so... Then much time hath passed indeed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003630_AZDAJA<tab>It doth feel like only yesterday that we were fighting the voidsent hordes the men of Allag had unleashed on Meracydia...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003640_AZDAJA<tab>Desperate to save Tiamat, I flew into this lightless world to strike at the heart of the Cloud of Darkness's forces.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003650_AZDAJA<tab>But the voidsent I slew returned again and again. And before I knew it, the rift betwixt worlds had closed. I was stranded. Bereft of strength...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003660_VRITRA<tab>Thou didst save the lives of full many, Sister.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003670_VRITRA<tab>Today, we abide in harmony with men, working side by side and forging enduring bonds.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003680_VRITRA<tab>Indeed, in the course of searching for thee, I did cross paths with many a noble mortal, with whom I built a nation of rich diversity.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003690_VRITRA<tab>To thee I would show it─my beautiful Radz-at-Han. I shall not rest until thou art free.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003700_AZDAJA<tab>When Golbez found me collapsed, the Darkness ravaging my wounds, he spoke and said:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003710_AZDAJA<tab>“'Tis but a matter of time before you turn. But I have the power to stop it.”
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003720_AZDAJA<tab>And he did─for a price. I would remain myself, but bound. An everlasting feast for his minions, who supped upon my aether over thousands of years.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003730_ESTINIEN<tab>What now, then? Does this great wyrm intend to remain a captive meal for all eternity, not daring to test her chains?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003740_AZDAJA<tab>If such is thine attempt at encouragement, mortal, then thou art as graceless as Nidhogg.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003750_AZDAJA<tab>'Twas Golbez who did weave this spell, and so his defeat should serve to unravel it. Would it suffice as a show of spirit were I to reveal what I know of the villain?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003760_ESTINIEN<tab>Now there's a start. So, what can you tell us?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003770_AZDAJA<tab>Mayhap in order to sustain the magick, he cannot travel far from this place.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003780_AZDAJA<tab>He doth prefer to send minions to carry out his will, but on occasion will himself ascend to the moon's surface.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003790_AZDAJA<tab>And every time, without fail, he will visit the same location to the south. Something of import lieth there, doubt not.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003800_ESTINIEN<tab>Well, you heard her. Shall we look into this spot near and dear to our enemy's heart?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Did you find something?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003820_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A memoria. But whose...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003830_DURANTE<tab>You have lied, pillaged, and murdered. Have you anything to say in your defense?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003840_MEMORIAMASTERA04661<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003850_MEMORIAMASTERA04661<tab>No. Every one of them got what they deserved. Trusting fools.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003860_MEMORIAMASTERA04661<tab>Like you would-be heroes. Aye, you'd do well to keep a close eye on each other.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003870_MEMORIAMASTERA04661<tab>It always ends the same way. A knife in the back. And better to have the handle towards your hand.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003880_MEMORIAMASTERA04661<tab>You'll see... Oh yes, you will...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003890_BARONKNIGHT<tab>...In death, may your soul find salvation.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003900_DURANTE<tab>I can't bring myself to pray for the unrepentant. You're a nobler man than I.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003910_BARONKNIGHT<tab>Come now. We are all shaped by these dark times more than we would care to admit.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003920_BARONKNIGHT<tab>I choose to believe that, had these men known peace and plenty, they would not have been consumed by mistrust and avarice.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003930_DURANTE<tab>Victims of the Contramemoria then, like so many others. But we will end it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003940_VOIDPERSON04735<tab>Thank you. I shudder to imagine what might have happened if you hadn't dealt with the dark ones.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003950_BARONKNIGHT<tab>...Who is that?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003960_VOIDPERSON04735<tab>Oh, her. She's like you, I hear. Hunts memoriates taken by Darkness.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003970_DURANTE<tab>Well, well, a kindred spirit. Perhaps we will finally have a new comrade.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003980_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>No. I've no interest in working with others, much less someone who looks as suspicious as you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003990_BARONKNIGHT<tab>Is that so...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004000_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...If there's nothing else, I'll be on my way.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004010_DURANTE<tab>Even when we share the same goal, we can't overcome the mistrust. Such is the way of things─the “wisdom” of our era...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004020_BARONKNIGHT<tab>Only a precious few memoriates remain who cling to the Light. Would that we could have won her over...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004030_DURANTE<tab>We'll make do, old friend. We have accomplished much already, and another person may well have been more of a hindrance than help.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004040_DURANTE<tab>Now then, our work here is finished.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004050_DURANTE<tab>His Majesty has summoned us, so let us not delay. To Baron!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Had another vision of the past, did you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...What? I was in it!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It's them─the pair I met in that village. Which means the one sealed in this memoria is...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004090_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>So, you have come. You who would oppose our crusade...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004100_VRITRA<tab>Sister!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You... I know you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004120_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Is that so? From the world before, I daresay.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004130_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>'Tis impressive enough that you have managed to retain your mortal form, but to remember your past besides...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004140_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But that is of no moment. You are the memoriate who vanquished my minions, correct?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004150_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And what if I am?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004160_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Then I would bid you join me. As a child of our world and slave to the wheel, fight with me for the salvation of all our souls.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Fight with you? More like fight as your pawn.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004180_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It isn't me you want, but my power. And if I don't obey, you'll bind me like you bound that dragon.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004190_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But no more. I refuse to be bound ever again. I fight only for myself, and for those in whom I trust. My friends.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004200_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>I see. A pity.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004210_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>It is for the dragon that you have come, yes?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004220_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>When first you appeared, I thought simply to remove a threat to our plan.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004230_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Never did I imagine that you would reach this place, and gift me a golden opportunity!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004240_VRITRA<tab>Speak plainly, gaoler.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004250_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004260_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Long as it has been imprisoned, this dragon has grown feeble and weak, its spirit extinguished.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004270_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Your coming has served to rekindle her forgotten hope.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004280_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Her yearning to be free─to return home! That is the key to our deliverance!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004290_VRITRA<tab>Azdaja! No!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004300_YSHTOLA<tab>The Darkness is ravaging her! She's becoming a voidsent!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004310_AZDAJA<tab>Vrtra... Thou must flee!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004320_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Rise, O Shadow Dragon, and obey!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004330_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Kill him.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004340_VRITRA<tab>Sister, please!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004350_ESTINIEN<tab>Damn you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004360_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Keep our guests occupied.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004370_VRITRA<tab>Save her, I beg thee... Save my sister...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004380_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Before Darkness swallowed the world, I fought tirelessly in a war without end.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004390_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>The experience taught me to discern the strong. That dragon...and you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004400_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Come. Face me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Rest assured I need no invitation.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll deal with you, and then I'll free Azdaja.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004410_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Accursed Light...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004420_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>You who have ever basked in its warmth could never understand our envy! Our agony!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004430_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>You will not deny us our release!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004440_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Expect no mercy. To destroy you, I shall bring my all to bear!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004445_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Come, warriors from beyond the rift!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004450_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>My power...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004455_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Even my blade... So this is the limit of my defiance...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004460_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Are you all right!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004470_ESTINIEN<tab>What's happening!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004480_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Hahaha... Ahahahahaha!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004490_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>At last, the moment is at hand...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004500_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>You may have bested me, but not quickly enough. Too late will you look to the chasm.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004510_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>You've won the battle, but I win the war!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004520_VRITRA<tab>Stop this, I beg of thee! Let her go!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004530_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Darkness made manifest once abided in the depths of this abyss. Until, one day, it dispersed in a haze of aether.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004540_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>In the absence of the great flow, that aether has nowhere to return.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004550_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>And so it has coalesced, giving rise to a mighty voidsent!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004560_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Now, feast! Feast upon this dragon, and its ardent longing for home with it!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004570_VRITRA<tab>Nooooooooo!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004580_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>From the convergence of ancient and newborn, an entity without equal shall emerge─one who shall tear down the barrier between worlds!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004590_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Upon you, who shall deliver us from eternal damnation, I bestow the name of a hero of eld!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004600_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Zeromus! Awaken!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004610_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>No matter how powerful, a voidsent can be sealed in memoria!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004620_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004630_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Damn it... It's too strong...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004640_YSHTOLA<tab>Our warding scales may not hold! Not against a voidsent born of Zodiark's aether!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004650_VRITRA<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004660_VRITRA<tab>We must retreat! Everyone, to me!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004670_VRITRA<tab>I will return, Sister, and I will save thee. This I swear!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004680_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004690_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004700_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Do you remember Ciriatto and Farfarello? The cowardly pair of voidsent that dwelled in my domain.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004710_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ciriatto devoured Farfarello.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004720_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And in so doing, he inherited an all-consuming fear of Barbariccia.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004730_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>For as you know, when a voidsent is devoured, it doesn't simply cease to be. Its soul persists within the devourer.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And when a voidsent dies, all the souls that harbored may break free to become individual entities once more.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004750_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>That is to say, by defeating Zeromus, we may yet save Azdaja.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004760_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And to make certain that we do, we must remind her of who she is.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>When the time comes, you must call to her. Call with all your being.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004780_VRITRA<tab>Thy words give me heart, Zero. Thou hast my gratitude.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004790_YSHTOLA<tab>Then it's settled. Our objective is to defeat Zeromus.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004800_YSHTOLA<tab>While it is unsettling that a voidsent could be born of Zodiark's aether, its very nature may render it susceptible to the brands that once contained Him. Did Urianger have aught to say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004810_YSHTOLA<tab>I see... If the seal may not hold for long, then haste is paramount.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004820_ESTINIEN<tab>Couldn't we just let it come to the Source and strike it down here?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004830_YSHTOLA<tab>Doing so would consign Azdaja's soul to the aetherial sea. Any attempt to ensure her survival demands that we deal with Zeromus in the Thirteenth.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004840_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I could barely go near it, never mind land a blow, so thick was the shroud of Darkness. How do you propose we fight such a foe?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004850_YSHTOLA<tab>Simple. Against impenetrable Darkness, we must wield resplendent Light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004860_YSHTOLA<tab>And it just so happens there is a world replete with Light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004870_YSHTOLA<tab>The question of how we will harness that Light you may leave to me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004880_YSHTOLA<tab>With our recent discoveries and proven techniques, as well as the aid of comrades near and far, I have faith that we will find a way.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004890_YSHTOLA<tab>But only if I begin my work at once. Rest up while you can, for there will be much to do when I return.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004900_ESTINIEN<tab>It wouldn't do to be idle while our esteemed sorceress labors tirelessly. I shall be training if you have need of me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004910_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Wait.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004920_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Allow me to join you. I must become stronger for what lies ahead.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004930_ESTINIEN<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004940_ESTINIEN<tab>Fine by me. Come on, then.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004950_VRITRA<tab>I shall not pass my time wallowing in despair. Using my vessel, I shall attend what preparations I may.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004960_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, on the moon of the Thirteenth...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004970_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Zeromus is risen, but not yet at full strength. It will take time before the fiend is able to breach the veil.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004980_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But what is another moment on this long journey I have endured.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_004990_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>It remains as fresh as if it were yesterday, old friend. The memory of your passing...and the pain.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_005000_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>As I promised you then, I promise you now: they shall sing of Golbez─the hero who shattered the wheel and brought salvation to the world.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002940_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
